pullrequest.title: Plotting Palette: Topics and Sim tabs

content.raw: The number I used was 800, so I guess somewhere between bold and ultra-bold. Tell me which one you'd prefer and I'll try to make it work. Putting any number under 800 was just showing thin lines, so it might take some work to figure out what's going on.
content.html: The number I used was 800, so I guess somewhere between bold and ultra-bold. Tell me which one you'd prefer and I'll try to make it work. Putting any number under 800 was just showing thin lines, so it might take some work to figure out what's going on.
